description: For sale: $620,000. Three large sun-filled bedrooms offer plenty of space aside from five closets, including a walk-in. Large living room and dining area are lit by wall-to-wall windows offering plenty of light and beautiful views of Queens.

For sale: $1,548,000. 32-28 30th Street - Pristine 2 Family
Just listed a beautiful large formal 2 Family Home in excellent condition. This home has a formal foyer leading to the 1st floor from the entrance from the front patio.

1st floor consists of a huge living room, formal dining room with a beautiful decorative fire place and leads to an eat in windowed kitchen and bathroom with shower stall. The living room has 3 large bay windows that let the light stream in.

 2nd floor has a master bedroom which will fit a king size bed with a decorative fireplace and 2 bedrooms that will fit a queen. The marble bathroom is large and has a window. Large walled closets allow for plenty of storage. Both the 1st and 2nd floor are graced with all hard wood floors in excellent condition. The rooms are closed for privacy when needed with gorgeous mahogany doors.

The 3rd floor consists of a living room, windowed eat in kitchen, and 2 nice sized bedrooms. Bathroom is windowed with a tub. There is also a full basement for added storage, and houses the water tank and boiler.

The patio is huge with a wonderful apple tree to shade from the sun. A wonderful entertaining place for your friends as the summer approaches!

For sale: $375,000. This lovely 2nd Floor apartment is located in the heart of Astoria, Queens in one of the best neighborhoods. Situated perfectly between the Broadway and 30th Avenue neighborhoods on Crescent St, it is close to all neighborhood amenities and transportation. The apartment is set back in the building with a beautiful courtyard separating it from the road. 
 The home gets tons of sunlight through large windows and has a terrific open floor plan in the living room/kitchen combo. You'll love the wood floors, renovated bathroom, and the ample closet space. Cats are permitted! However, there are no dogs allowed and the building has a no smoking policy in place. There is laundry in the building and the maintenance which includes taxes, heat, and water is $720.67. The building has been completely retrofitted with a virtual doorman and key fob access to the main entrance. Sublet unlimited after 2.5 years. Come have a look at this perfect junior 1 bedroom located on the 2nd floor of this great building!

address: 1124 31st Ave APT 7D, Long Island City, NY 11106
description:
For sale: $729,995. Best 1 bedroom deal in the building. Generously sized 699 SF 1 bed 1 bath at East River Tower with direct city views with two (2) dedicated parking spaces. A great apartment in a luxury doorman building with Manhattan Skyline and East River views. Enjoy, floor to ceiling windows, oak hardwood flooring, dramatic high ceilings, central air, energy-efficient windows, custom window treatments, W/D in unit and a large private balcony. The open gourmet kitchen is equipped with GE Profile stainless steel appliances, tiger wood cabinetry providing plenty of storage, satin-finished granite counter tops and a center island overlooking the living room. The king-sized bedroom offers great closet space as well as breathtaking city views. This apartment also features a private balcony, customized California closets and solar shades throughout. The over-sized bathroom is lined with marble and has a deep soaking tub. 

The East River Tower is a full-service condo complete with a full-time doorman, security service, fitness center, and outdoor terrace with communal grills. The parking garage is located on the building's first floor. There is also an East River Ferry stop a few short blocks away next to Socrates Sculpture Park. Tax abatement is in place through July 2025.

For sale: $1,238,000. This is a unique opportunity to buy a resale in a 2.5 years old condominium. No extra developer closing costs saving you thousands of dollars while taking advantage of a 421A tax abatement with 12.5 years left makes it for the perfect investment or first time home buying. 

 The apartment: 

 6th floor east facing 2-bedroom 2-bathroom like new 975 square foot apartment. Only 2.5 years old this gorgeous, well-crafted apt faces East and benefits from great natural light all day. The open kitchen is equipped with custom Pedini hardwood cabinetry, a Caesarstone counter top, and a combination of Bosch and Liebherr appliances. The luxurious baths are lined with ceramic tiles, they feature custom Pedini hardwood vanities, marble sink tops, Toto toilets and Hansgrohe fixtures. Floor to ceiling windows and hardwood floors throughout the apt. Full size W/D is included. A full 421a tax abatement is in place helping save you thousands of dollars every year. 

 The building: 

 The Marx condominium is located in the Kaufman Arts District. Amenities include a virtual doorman system and package storage, a lounge and work space, a gym, a roof deck with a grill one floor up, a laundry room, and bike storage. Storage cages are available for purchase as well. 

 The neighborhood: 

 The MARX apartment building is situated in the Kaufman Arts District neighborhood across the street from Kaufman Studios bordering Astoria and Dutch Kills with artists, actors and entrepreneurs; chic restaurants, cafes and art spaces. Stroll a few short blocks to catch a film at the local movie theater, buy groceries at the one of the many local grocers and markets, grab a bite at a local eatery (you can find any cuisine you are looking for, but the specialty is Greek) or zip into Midtown Manhattan within 15 minutes. 

 The Kaufman Arts District, anchored by the historic Kaufman Astoria Studios, is home to a community of unique cultural institutions that support emerging artists. Founded by KAS, Museum of the Moving Image and Queens Council on the Arts, KAD spans 24+ blocks and serves to advocate for and promote arts in our neighborhood. KAD is Queens first cultural district. 

 CINEMA 

 Kaufman Astoria Theaters Zukor Theater (ticketed events) 

 COFFEE SHOPS 

 Swick 2 - pours Stumptown beans also serves delicious breakfast sandwiches and is open early and late Kinship - Pours Stumptown - 2 Steinway locations 

 Astoria Coffee 

 MUSEUMS AND INSTITIUTIONS 5Pointz Tribute Wall by Meres One

 Flux Factory Frank Sinatra School of the Arts

 The Noguchi Museum UA-14 @ Kaufman Astoria Studios Multiplex 

 RESTAURANTS/FARMERS MARKET

 Dutch Kills CSA Astoria Seafood

 Milkflower 

 YOGA / GYMS (all within a few blocks) 

 The Yoga Room 

 Yoga Agora 

 Astoria Sports Complex 

 Wild Heart Performing Arts Studio 

 Upper 90 Soccer Complex 

 

 Transportation: 

 3 blocks to the R/M Steinway train station and 4 blocks to the newly renovated N/W 36th ave stop - from there only three stops to Midtown Manhattan and can also easily connect to the E, 7 and G trains within two stops. In addition - by taxi, midtown Manhattan is only a short 15 min ride away. 

 The Marx is only 4.5 miles from LaGuardia accessible by subway, bus or taxi and 20 minutes to JFK by taxi.
